issues.message: [{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Resected tissue should be placed in Falcon tube with adDMEM/F12+++ with Primocin (100 µg/ml) and transferred to lab as soon as possible.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Transfer tissue sample (<3–4 cm³) into separate 50-ml Falcon tube filled with D-BSA. Keep on ice.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Take microscopic picture of tissue including ruler (Fig. 2c).'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Aspirate excess D-BSA and cut tissue into 2–4 mm³ pieces using two scalpels.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Optional: Transfer 1–2 tissue pieces to 2-ml Eppendorf tube for DNA analysis. Snap freeze on dry ice and store at −20 °C.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Optional: Fix two tissue pieces in 5 ml 4% formalin in 15-ml Falcon tube. Perform in fume hood.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Optional: Transfer 1–2 tissue pieces to 2-ml microtube labeled for RNA. Snap freeze on dry ice and store at −80 °C.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Optional: Transfer 1–2 tissue pieces to 2-ml microtube labeled for protein. Snap freeze on dry ice and store at −80 °C.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Mince remaining tissue into 0.5–1 mm³ pieces using two scalpels until uniform and viscous.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Add 5 ml D-BSA to Petri dish and transfer minced tissue to 50-ml Falcon tube using pre-wetted 5-ml serological pipette.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Wash Petri dish with 5 ml D-BSA and collect residual tissue into same Falcon tube.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Resuspend minced tissue by pipetting up and down five times using pre-wetted 10-ml serological pipette.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Aspirate all but 10 ml of D-BSA.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Wrap Falcon tube with Paraﬁlm, place at 15° angle on orbital shaker in heated incubator. Digest tissue for 1–2 h.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Pipette up and down 5–10 times every 30 min using pre-wetted 5-ml serological pipette to aid digestion.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Monitor digestion every 30 min using inverted bright-field microscope (×5, ×10, ×20). Digestion complete when clusters observed (Fig. 2g).'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'After incubation, add 1 ml FBS to stop collagenase digestion.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Homogenize digested tissue by pipetting vigorously with pre-wetted 10-ml serological pipette.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Pre-wet 100-µm strainer with 10 ml D-BSA into new 50-ml Falcon tube. Swirl and discard D-BSA.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Strain digested tissue over pre-wetted 100-µm strainer into 50-ml Falcon tube.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Transfer unfiltered tissue back to initial Falcon tube by reversing filter and flushing with 10 ml D-BSA.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Pipette digested tissue up and down vigorously using pre-wetted 10-ml serological pipette.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Reverse 100-µm filter and strain tissue again into same 50-ml Falcon tube.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Aspirate supernatant, leaving last 4 ml. Resuspend pellet in remaining 4 ml and transfer to pre-wetted 15-ml Falcon tube.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Homogenize by pipetting up and down several times.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Aspirate supernatant carefully with vacuum system until 1 ml remains. Let rest 1 min, then remove residual D-BSA with P1000 pipette.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Optional: If pellet is red, add 1–2 ml red blood cell lysis buffer. Resuspend and incubate 2 min at RT. Use 1 ml if pellet <100 µl, 2 ml if >100 µl.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Pipette up and down several times.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Optional: Freeze cells with Recovery Cell Freezing Medium (1 ml) in cryovial as backup.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Resuspend pellet in BME. Use 200 µl BME per ~50 µl pellet. Scale linearly. Keep BME on ice. Work quickly to prevent solidification.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Plate 100 µl BME-containing cells in multiple small drops (<20 µl each) per well of 12-well plate (Fig. 2e). Scale down to 24-well if needed (Table 3).'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Transfer plate upside down to 37 °C incubator to solidify BME for 30 min.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Add 750 µl pre-warmed Type 1 or Type 2 medium to each well. Refer to Table 3 for volumes per plate type.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Monitor organoid growth periodically with inverted bright-field microscope.'}] is not of type 'object'
